languages.text: "Убедила отца, что хочу лично проводить ревизию импортируемых товаров — надо же ума набираться, чтобы род не опозорить. В порту познакомилась с торговцами, миссионерами, солдатами. Слушала их рассказы, изучала карты, узнала, какие документы нужно подделать, чтобы покинуть планету. Слово здесь, монета там — и вот я уже в железном брюхе корабля, спешу в Пустоту за новой жизнью".

traits.locale_text: "Убедила отца, что хочу лично проводить ревизию импортируемых товаров — мол, надо же ума набираться. В порту познакомилась с торговцами, миссионерами, солдатами. Слушала их рассказы, изучала карты, узнала, какие документы нужно подделать, чтобы покинуть планету. Слово здесь, монета там — и вот я уже в железном брюхе корабля, спешу в Пустоту за новой жизнью".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I convinced my father I personally wished to oversee the inspection of imported goods — I had to get experience so I wouldn't bring shame on our family, didn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries, and soldiers at the port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."
languages.original_text: "Убедила отца, что хочу лично проводить ревизию импортируемых товаров — надо же ума набираться, чтобы род не опозорить. В порту познакомилась с торговцами, миссионерами, солдатами. Слушала их рассказы, изучала карты, узнала, какие документы нужно подделать, чтобы покинуть планету. Слово здесь, монета там — и вот я уже в железном брюхе корабля, спешу в Пустоту за новой жизнью".

traits.locale_text: "I convinced my father I personally wish to oversee the revision of the imported goods — I had to get experience so I would not to bring shame to our family, hadn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries and soldiers at port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the vessel's iron gut, braving the Void in search of a new life."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我说服了我父亲，让他允许我负责监督进口货物的检查工作。我必须想办法获得经验，这样才不会令我的家族蒙羞，是吧？我去了港口，与那里的商人、传教士和士兵交了朋友。我听着他们讲述的那些故事，研究星图，了解到我需要伪造哪些文件才能逃出那颗行星。我在这里说几句好话，又在那里掏出几枚亮闪闪的金币。就这样，我来到了这艘虚空舰的钢铁身躯之中，在虚空中不断前行，寻找新的生活。”
languages.original_text: "I convinced my father I personally wished to oversee the inspection of imported goods — I had to get experience so I wouldn't bring shame on our family, didn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries, and soldiers at the port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."

traits.locale_text: “我说服了我父亲，让他允许我负责监督进口货物的检查工作。我必须想办法获得经验，这样才不会令我的家族蒙羞，是吧？我去了港口，与那里的商人、传教士和士兵交了朋友。我听着他们讲述的那些故事，研究星图，了解到我需要伪造哪些文件才能逃出那颗行星。我在这里说几句好话，又在那里掏出几枚亮闪闪的金币。就这样，我来到了这艘虚空舰的钢铁身躯之中，在虚空中不断前行，寻找新的生活。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "I convinced my father I personally wished to oversee the inspection of imported goods — I had to get experience so I wouldn't bring shame on our family, didn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries, and soldiers at the port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."

languages.text: «Convencí a mi padre de que deseaba supervisar personalmente la inspección de la mercancía importada, porque necesitaba experiencia para no avergonzar a la familia, ¿no? Me hice amiga de comerciantes, misioneros y soldados en el puerto. Escuché sus historias, estudié las tablas, descubrí qué documentos tenía que falsificar para escapar del planeta... Un cumplido por aquí, una monedita por allá... y me encuentro en las tripas de hierro de una nave, viajando por el vacío en busca de una nueva vida».
languages.original_text: "I convinced my father I personally wished to oversee the inspection of imported goods — I had to get experience so I wouldn't bring shame on our family, didn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries, and soldiers at the port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."

traits.locale_text: «Convencí a mi padre de que deseaba supervisar personalmente la inspección de la mercancía importada, porque necesitaba experiencia para no avergonzar a la familia, ¿no? Me hice amiga de comerciantes, misioneros y soldados en el puerto. Escuché sus historias, estudié las tablas, descubrí qué documentos tenía que falsificar para escapar del planeta... Un cumplido por aquí, una monedita por allá... y me encuentro en las tripas de hierro de una nave, viajando por el vacío en busca de una nueva vida».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしは父を説得し、輸入品の検査を監督することを自ら希望した…家族に恥をかかせないためにも、あたしは経験を積まなきゃいけなかった。港で交易商や宣教師、兵士たちと友達になった。彼らの話を聞き、航図を研究し、この星から脱出するために偽造しなければならない書類を学んだ。こちらで親切な言葉をかけられ、あちらで光るコインをもらった…そして今、あたしは船の鉄の腹の中にいるんだ。新たな人生を探し求めてね」
languages.original_text: "I convinced my father I personally wished to oversee the inspection of imported goods — I had to get experience so I wouldn't bring shame on our family, didn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries, and soldiers at the port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしは父を説得し、輸入品の検査を監督することを自ら希望した…家族に恥をかかせないためにも、あたしは経験を積まなきゃいけなかった。港で交易商や宣教師、兵士たちと友達になった。彼らの話を聞き、航図を研究し、この星から脱出するために偽造しなければならない書類を学んだ。こちらで親切な言葉をかけられ、あちらで光るコインをもらった…そして今、あたしは船の鉄の腹の中にいるんだ。新たな人生を探し求めてね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe meinen Vater überzeugt, dass ich die Inspektion importierter Waren persönlich beaufsichtigen möchte. Ich musste doch Erfahrung sammeln, um unserer Familie keine Schande zu machen, nicht wahr? Ich habe mich im Hafen mit Händlern, Missionaren und Soldaten angefreundet. Ich habe mir ihre Geschichten angehört, die Sternenkarten studiert, gelernt, welche Dokumente ich fälschen musste, um vom Planeten zu entkommen. Ein freundliches Wort hier, eine glänzende Münze da — und schon sitze im eisernen Bauch eines Schiffs und wage mich auf der Suche nach einem neuen Leben in die Leere."
languages.original_text: "I convinced my father I personally wished to oversee the inspection of imported goods — I had to get experience so I wouldn't bring shame on our family, didn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries, and soldiers at the port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe meinen Vater überzeugt, dass ich die Inspektion importierter Waren persönlich beaufsichtigen möchte. Ich musste doch Erfahrung sammeln, um unserer Familie keine Schande zu machen, nicht wahr? Ich habe mich im Hafen mit Händlern, Missionaren und Soldaten angefreundet. Ich habe mir ihre Geschichten angehört, die Sternenkarten studiert, gelernt, welche Dokumente ich fälschen musste, um vom Planeten zu entkommen. Ein freundliches Wort hier, eine glänzende Münze da — und schon sitze im eisernen Bauch eines Schiffs und wage mich auf der Suche nach einem neuen Leben in die Leere."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai convaincu mon père que je souhaitais superviser moi-même l'inspection des importations. Il fallait bien que je gagne en expérience pour ne pas faire honte à ma famille, n'est-ce pas ? Je me suis liée d'amitié avec des commerçants, des missionnaires et des soldats du port. J'ai écouté leurs histoires, étudié les cartes, déterminé quels documents je devais contrefaire pour fuir la planète. Avec quelques mots aimables et poignées de pièces dispensés par-ci par-là, je me suis vite retrouvée dans le ventre d'un vaisseau spatial, bravant le vide en quête d'une nouvelle vie. »
languages.original_text: "I convinced my father I personally wished to oversee the inspection of imported goods — I had to get experience so I wouldn't bring shame on our family, didn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries, and soldiers at the port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai convaincu mon père que je souhaitais superviser moi-même l'inspection des importations. Il fallait bien que je gagne en expérience pour ne pas faire honte à ma famille, n'est-ce pas ? Je me suis liée d'amitié avec des commerçants, des missionnaires et des soldats du port. J'ai écouté leurs histoires, étudié les cartes, déterminé quels documents je devais contrefaire pour fuir la planète. Avec quelques mots aimables et poignées de pièces dispensés par-ci par-là, je me suis vite retrouvée dans le ventre d'un vaisseau spatial, bravant le vide en quête d'une nouvelle vie. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Babamı, ithal ürünleri bizzat denetlemek istediğime ikna ettim. İleride ailemi utandırmamak için deneyim kazanmalıydım sonuçta, değil mi? Limandaki tacirlerle, misyonerlerle ve askerlerle dostluk kurdum. Hikâyelerini dinledim, yolculuk ettikleri yerlerin haritalarını inceledim, gezegenden kaçabilmek için hangi belgelerin sahtesini ayarlamam gerektiğini öğrendim. Orada burada bir çift tatlı söz, sağda solda bir miktar rüşvet derken oldu! Bir baktım ki bir geminin demirden midesinin içinde, uçsuzda kendime yeni bir yaşam arayışındaydım."
languages.original_text: "I convinced my father I personally wished to oversee the inspection of imported goods — I had to get experience so I wouldn't bring shame on our family, didn't I? I made friends with traders, missionaries, and soldiers at the port. I listened to their stories, studied the charts, learned what documents I had to forge to escape the planet. A kind word here, a shiny coin there — and here I am in the iron belly of a ship, braving the void in search of a new life."

traits.locale_text: "Babamı ithal edilen ürünleri bizzat denetlemek istediğime ikna ettim. İleride ailemi utandırmamam için deneyim kazanmalıydım sonuçta, değil mi? Limandaki tacirlerle, misyonerlerle ve askerlerle dostluk kurdum. Onların hikâyelerini dinledim, yolculuk ettikleri yerlerin haritalarını inceledim, gezegenden kaçabilmek için hangi belgelerin sahtesini ayarlamam gerektiğini öğrendim. Orada burada bir çift tatlı söz, orada burada bir miktar rüşvet ve ta da! Göz açıp kapayıncaya kadar bir geminin demirden midesinin içinde, uçsuzda kendime yeni bir yaşam arayışındaydım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
